OOC: Swallowing rocks? OUCH!...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilo=
vealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, August 17, 2000 1=
0:33 PM
  Subject: Re: Sinesis, still waiting........


  Twister


  *Twis=
ter had never felt so unwanted in her whole life. She wasn't wanted by her =
own family but she was took in by other bots that had a home and felt deep =
pity for her. But she wasn't even took in by one. She felt she was an only =
child since it has been days and days since she'd seen her sister. She got =
to thinking that she'd been wrong the whole time about trying to get Blizza=
rd away from Sinister. She had never felt the depressed emotions her whole =
life and now she did*

  *Twister frowns and looks at herself. So much wish=
ing that she had mirror so she could get a good idea of what section of her=
 face to punch. She starts to get hungrier and looks at some wires on herse=
lf and starts getting hungry enough to eat herself like she had mentioned e=
arlier*

  *Twister starts shaking of hunger and bares her teeth and groans=
*

  Twister: Heh.....heh heh......Hahahaha......I've served my porpose by =
keeping my sister company till she met the right bot to take over that job.=
.....My porpose in life, a big waste.....

  *Twister takes her double blad=
ed sword out*

  *Twister so badly wants to kill herself but even tough she=
 thinks that Blizzard wouldn't want to see her again, she so badly wanted t=
o see Blizzard. Twister slowly puts her double bladed sword away and sighs =
a deep sigh of deprestion and frowns. She sits on rock and picks up a small=
er rock and swallows it. She was still hungry and thirsty. Twister knew her=
 deprestion was growing bigger but she'd rather die than let one tear slip =
by*

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@eg=
roups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, August 17, 2000 4:26 AM
    Subject: Re: Sin=
esis, still waiting........


    Sinesis starts to ponder about killing hi=
mself. He had a good life with the Predacons, but he was kicked out quickly=
 upon his return. Then he realized the truth. Nobody wanted bounty hunters =
anymore...he was out of work. Sinesis started to push the self destruct seq=
uence on a keypad but changed his mind. He was too afraid to kill himself..=
.
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
      To=
: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Tuesday, August 15, 2000 9:56 PM
      Su=
bject: Re: Sinesis, still waiting........


      Twister


      *Twister =
frowns and blinks her optics*


      Twister: "If that's where we're left =
to be....."

      *Twister looks around herself and frowns as she see's so=
 fruit or anything on any trees*

        ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
     From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Tuesday, =
August 15, 2000 5:09 PM
        Subject: Re: Sinesis, still waiting........=



        "Live in the jungle? I hope that was a joke, Twister!" Sinesis s=
aid angrily. He didn't like jokes, unless he was the one pulling them. Sine=
sis realized that Twister was right, though.

        "Well, we'll make the=
 most of it out in the wild, then, we have no place to go." Sinesis said. H=
e looked at a cave. Caves always creeped him out, especially when there wer=
e THINGS in it...
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: i=
lovealllizards 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Sunday, A=
ugust 13, 2000 7:06 PM
          Subject: Re: Sinesis, still waiting.......=
.


          Twister


          *Twister looks at Sinesis and frowns. She=
 follows Sinesis*


          Twister:  "We can always live in the jungle."=


          *Twister says to Sinesis*

            ----- Original Message -=
---- 
            From: THECODE 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      =
      Sent: Sunday, August 13, 2000 2:42 AM
            Subject: Sinesis, s=
till waiting........


            Sinesis keeps on waiting. Suddenly, he f=
igures that the leader is on vacation (Whomever gave him that idea?) and st=
arts to walk away, slwoly shaking his head no to Twister...



------------=
----------------------------------------------------------------
